website_summaries.verdict: Roku's top-end 4K media streaming box, the Ultra, is packed full of handy features, but whether they're worth the $100 price depends on your viewing needs. For many, the $70 Streaming Stick+ will be just fine.
pros: Lots of streaming apps and services

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: I was using a combination of an old PS3 and a Now TV box to watch various services in my bedroom. Now wondering why did I not buy one little beauties of these sooner?! All my services in one place (plus a couple of new ones I'm happy to have discovered), easy to search and it's so dinky - stuck it to the top on my TV and I barely notice it's there. I've had no problems with Internet connectivity, although we do have excellent wireless and very fast speeds so I wouldn't expect any issues. I really like the accompanying iphone app as well. Quite delighted with this little gadget and will be recommending to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Pullinger

customer_reviews.title: So much quicker!
customer_reviews.text: Had the new Roku Express just over a week now, and it was definitely worth the upgrade. Much faster loading times and remote function, a vast improvement over the laggy older version.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: If you have WiFi issues use the supplied power  !!!  Super speedy UI and the perfect replacement for 3500EU sticks.
customer_reviews.text: Initially had some problems getting it to connect to WiFi which was fixed once connected to the supplied Roku Power Supply So clearly it draws more power than the 3500EU Roku stick it replaced that had been happily powered from the USB port of an ageing LG LCD TV. Perfect replacement for ROKU 3500EU stick Installed Plex, Netflix, iPlayer and Spotify as before all up and running in 10 mins or less
customer_reviews.author: Tricksy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BRILLIANT. Makes TV streaming easier!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical but I am so glad I bought this. It was an absolute doddle to set up. It is tiny so that you can barely see it when stuck to the bottom of the TV. You can control it through your mobile phone as well as the very simple to use remote control. It makes navigation and finding programmes so much easier. My only request is for voice activation because I'm sure they would do that really well as well. It beats Xbox and PS4 navigation systems by at least 75% and I will never use anything else to watch or download TV or movies again. Buy it today!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't let you watch anything, even iPlayer or YouTube without full credit card and address details
customer_reviews.text: On switching on, the first thing it does after updating is tell you to use a computer or mobile to access their website where you have to put in your credit card details to create the mandatory account. I only bought this to watch YouTube and iPlayer on a non-smart TV there is no need to provide that information. The product description says 'Plug it in, connect to the internet, and start streaming. It’s as simple as that.' which is very misleading. Nowhere in the blurb does it say you have to create an account. I would have bought a different product if I'd known, which I guess is why they hide that info.
customer_reviews.author: SententiousOne

customer_reviews.title: Sharp picture, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Menus load quickly and the picture quality is good. NowTV looks sharper than on my earlier NowTV box. The Roku also allows you to access other major platforms:- Amazon, Netflix...
customer_reviews.author: John, Stockton-on-Tees

customer_reviews.title: APPS NOT AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.text: The device itself works fine... HOWEVER, I think Amazon should be looking into this for false advertising as you can only actually get three of the apps advertised on the box, Netflix, Youtube and BBC iplayer. None of the others shown are available to install, and all the other offered apps are just junk. Save yourself the dissapointment and buy a firestick instead.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get the RUKO to put out a 720 instead of a 1080p which, although my TV can support, the RUKO couldn't use. Once the device was set for 720 output I can no longer use some of the Apps as they want the HD output. So now I've a device that should turn a regular 1080 TV into a smart TV but doesn't, so I will have to upgrade my TV to a smart TV which will make the RUKO device obsolete. Absolute joke.
customer_reviews.author: Medlgr

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, well-designed features
customer_reviews.text: This has transformed my viewing, taking my Panasonic to a new, smooth, well-designed level and completely replacing the terrible built-in TV smart features. YouTube, Plex, Amazon Prime all working brilliantly. WiFi, HDMI, power from usb. Mine is stuck on the side of the TV discreetly. The remote works at ANY angle, better actually than the TV remote.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in England

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero stars if I could, advertised as 'just plug it into your TV with the included High Speed HDMI Cable, connect to the Internet, and start streaming' totally false, sign up and payment info required, even if you have no intention of purchasing anything. Also, on checking their website, they give this following advice - 'What to do if the red light is on or you see a “Your device is overheating” warning WARNING: Be careful!...' Good to see they take customer safety seriously! It's going back for a full refund before I even plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Delbell61

customer_reviews.title: Useless device after recent software update - cannot even contact Roku in UK
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfectly for the first 10 months or so and after a recent software update it’s antenna strength is much weaker at picking up WiFi signals. This issue seems common across the forums, and worst off despite staying there is a 2 year warranty there does not seem to be anyway to contact roku customer support or return the device using their website. However amazon stepped in and issued a full refund straight away, so excellent service on their side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No bbc , itv or demand 5 !
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a family friend. Installed the device, but can’t find BBC Iplayer , ITV or demand 5. Reset the device several times yet no luck. Only shows BBC America. Non of the UK channels are listed despite we live in UK. Contacted Roku support which is basically non existent. It shows bbc iplayer and demand 5 on the packaging box yet I still can’t find them. I’ll be returning the device back. Wasted time trying to sort the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great option for internet TV when no ariel hook up possible
customer_reviews.text: I got a little bewildered with all the plug in options out there - I wanted something simple to use for the guest room TV This is very clear and easy to set up. Plug in, connect to wifi - pick the channel apps you want. I just went for all the free to air catch up terrestrial channels, and connected to my Amazon prime & netflix accounts. Then I added a few other free channels which do old movies, news and one that does live TV. Really good option as I didn't want to go to trouble of hooking up an ariel. You can also subscribe to other channels and get movies etc. Really impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss I, London

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully brilliant
customer_reviews.text: My first experience of Roku was on holiday in the USA and loved it. When I got home I decided to replace my existing FireStick and I haven't been disappointed. The user interface is simple and easy to use and the remote is quick and responsive. It's much more tactile than the Amazon remote with handy shortcut buttons. The picture quality is great, search feature brilliant and can be used with pretty much all the apps/streaming services you'll need.....including Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, covers all the media platforms you need.
customer_reviews.text: We now have 2 of these and can't imagine life without them. Sure we have a smart TV but it takes that little bit longer to load and not as user friendly. The Roku wins hands down with user friendliness, speed and quality. If like me you have prime, Netflix and Nowtv, this covers all the platforms that the firestick/nowtvstick etc does not. Amazing product and a great price for what you get. It worked great in our hotel in Austria as it did some funky think by using my mobile phone as a middleman to stream using the hotel WiFi which was brilliant!! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roots

customer_reviews.title: Really fast navigation, excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Read some bad reviews about this product, but after using it i’m very pleased and impressed. Mainly used for Netflix and YouTube. both apps run like a dream on this little stick, very responsive navigation. Only let down is that the remote uses Infer red not Bluetooth. It has a Netflix Button which is great, but other dedicated application buttons are a bit of a waste. I’m a big fan for Amazon fire TV sticks, but the Roku stick feels much more responsive, so much so I would consider replacing my fire tv with these especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: CPJ

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says on the packet
customer_reviews.text: Really annoyed, roku is ace but this isn't what it seems. Hardly none of the channels it shows on the box are on it, due to the fact that although brand new and with an English plug, it's an American roku. The channels on it like vudu are only available in America. I'm using it, but it's annoying because I really wanted now tv, BBC I player and itv player and 4od....none are on there, even the news channels are all American.
customer_reviews.author: Just Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had been using the Amazon Fire stick for the past couple of years and it was quite slow and laggy. Often I would need to restart it to get it working. This product starts up really quickly and streams really well. No lag or buffering issues. I also like the fact there is a Netflix button. It would be great if you could reprogram the other buttons for quick access of other frequently used apps rather than the predetermined ones. Really happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Trello

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up with great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: THE GOOD: The player was easy to set up and the picture quality on Netflix etc was excellent THE BAD: Installing the Roku app on your phone should enable you to control the player and by plugging in headphones listen in private. The app controls the player OK but the sound repeatedly cuts out on headphones. The Roku store has hundreds of apps. Some of the mainstream apps that you might have heard of are good. Sadly many of the apps are frankly dire. I would question how much Roku vet apps before loading them onto their store. SUMMARY: All in all a great media player. Venture onto the Roku app store at your peril!
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a Chromecast before, but I didn't want to be relying on using Chrome on my laptop to cast shows and movies to the TV. Roku has the various apps (iPlayer, Netflix, Amazon Prime, 4oD etc) built in, so all you need to do is add your login details for these services one time only, and then stream to your hearts content using the handy remote control. There is also an app available, which apparently offers some nice features too, but I haven't made use of it up to now. I definitely recommend the Roku Express Player, a great way to bring your online streaming services right to your television.
customer_reviews.author: LikeASatellite

customer_reviews.title: Better than a firestick
customer_reviews.text: We also own an amazon fire stick and we find this is a lot more user friendly. The interface is cleaner and as it's "app agnostic" it doesn't constantly try to sell you new channels as the homepage of the fire stick does. It's nice to be able to watch youtube on TV again, and I'm finding that is what I'm mostly watching. Prime unfortunately seems to be deliberately clunky on this format but that is so far the only drawback. Everything was pretty simple to set up and even the design of the remote control and receiver look good. I definitely like this and think it's a great option for anyone wanting to update an older TV.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Be careful which email address you use!
customer_reviews.text: Would not give me BBC iPlayer, Now TV, ITV Hub, More 4, Etc. Could not obtain any support from Roku. Sent back. Have since bought one from Argos and initially had the same issue. I watched several YouTube videos and heard someone mention setting up your Roku account on the Roku website, which I had done, but using an Apple email address (me.com). I tried setting up a new account using a BT email address and Hey Presto! I now have all the relevant UK apps and I am so impressed I am off to buy more Rokus for other TVs in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Gooders

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up - turns your normal TV into a smart TV pretty much
customer_reviews.text: If you are a freeview person, and you are not interested in too many "paid for" services, then this could be for you. It's an alternative to the fire stick, and gives you access to most of the popular subscription free services in the UK - i.e. iPlayer, UKTVplay, All4 and so on. Set up was easy, the usual wifi shenanigans, but once set up, you can have the remote on your phone and away you go. It plugs straight into the HDMI socket on the back of your TV (assuming it's not 20 years old) and powers from a USB connector into a charger style plug.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marczak

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product, I was very pleased with it - simple and easy to use. But after a few months it stopped working - it wouldn't recognise the wifi network anymore. After a month of back and forth with the customer service dept, they agreed to replace it. I sent it off as instructed, and then received nothing. After weeks and hours of chasing, I got absolutely nowhere, and they refused to refund me. Terrible customer service, unreliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Roku - the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Roku product - the first one I bought for another tv @2years ago. I was unsure about ordering this one, as it has a mains plug and I only wanted to use power from the usb port on my tv. Needn't have worried as it works perfectly without using the mains plug. Very simple to set up and the user interface is logical and therefore simple. The remote is small, simple and has a 'quality' feel to it. These are great little units and if you need this type of item, then look no further!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Impulse buy but quite a good one
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this as an impulse buy as we already had something similar (now tv box) but the controls on that one were getting me a bit frustrated. Ordered this one, and from unpacking it to setting it up took less than 5 minutes - so i'm pleased with the ease of setup. The remote is wonderful, it works even if you are not pointing it directly at the box. You also have so many options on the apps you can download. Over the moon with this product and would definitely recommend this for purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Busby

customer_reviews.title: magic piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: got this to try pick up netflix on my 10 year old tv i have in the bedroom via the wifi, after a 5min setup i was in slob heaven lying on my bed watching all the goodies netflix has to offer, was very sceptical about this device even with all the positive reviews but blown away by how easy it was to set up and use, you even get a netflix button! i cant comment on any other features as i bought this just for netflix but i can safely say ill be getting another 1 for my old tv in another room now!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a faff to set up, but...
customer_reviews.text: It is, I have to say, a bit of a faff to set up. Not difficult, just a faff. It took me an evening to set up the "channels" I wanted to watch, and I couldn't get the sound on initially. I switched it off overnight and the sound was working perfectly when I switched it back on. I used the my.roku.com/signup/nocc link to sign up, as this link allows you to ignore the request for payment details, as I was only interested in the Freeview stuff. Now it's all set up, I can't find fault with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: All your content through just one device - finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a multitude of streaming devices over the years (Chromecast, Firestick, Now TV box) and, for overall range of viewing apps (or 'Channels' as Roku calls them) this is far and away the best. Having Prime, Netflix and Now TV on one device is fantastic and all my old remotes have been consigned to the attic. Also, you can get Netflix, Sky Movies, Sky Entertainment and Prime for the same monthly cost as the Sky 'base' package. Ditch Sky TV or Virgin and go via Roku. It's a no-brainer in my view. Best item I've bought off Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Cheap way to get Catch-up TV on a dumb TV.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to access catch-up TV cheaply. It takes a bit of effort setting up logins for the device itself and the most of the channels which involves starting the logon on the TV and then sprinting the the computer to enter a password. Just follow the instructions on the TV. It's important that the Roku device can receive data from your Wifi or nothing will happen. Finally it's really amazing how many channels are available (and mostly free).
customer_reviews.author: W H Turner

customer_reviews.title: Truly Atrocious Money Grabbing Box
customer_reviews.text: Will not even boot up until you give it a credit card number. Every app seems to want you to pay for something. Most of the "channels" (apps) don't even work. Many are amateur attempts at programming and promise far more than they deliver. Even Roku's own media player app can't display photographs properly. I bought this to replace an Android TV box after becoming frustrated at the shortcomings of Kodi, but this is in another league as far as lack of usability is concerned. It will be going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: PhilC

customer_reviews.title: Great value streamer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap way to add streaming services to my projector, and this did the trick. I tried an amazon stick, but this has a few advantages: More services, low power so it runs off the projector's USB port, and it has an infra-red controller so I can control it with my universal remote. The projector is max 1080P so I do not need 4K output, and the picture quality is just as good as other devices at that resolution. It is fast and easy to use - much less cluttered interface than the Fire Stick. So for my requirements, it is perfect, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisW

customer_reviews.title: No Facility to Screen Mirror/Cast with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: In buying mode I was stuck between new black NOW box (old white one kept dropping stuff out) or Amazon Fire Thing. So many people gushing on here about this Roku thing figured they couldn't all work for company. Chose it cause of reviews and cause it's not Sky or Amazon. Right now, bit tazzed off. Can't cast/screen mirror direct from iPhone. It says so directly in Roku help section. Will have to fork out £30 for chromecast. Humbled this is what tech savvy acquaintance suggested I got rather than anything.
customer_reviews.author: J M Wood

customer_reviews.title: Content on demand
customer_reviews.text: All you need is good internet and you are good to go. Set up is very easy and doesn’t take much space. It comes with as many channels as you can imagine. It’s unique as a streamer and much better than other streamers. I haven’t tried the voice control but of it largely because in couldn’t get to link my iPhone to enable me control the device. But that doesn’t get in the way of my viewing pleasure. I highly recommend this streamer.
customer_reviews.author: Yahans k.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Roku
customer_reviews.text: I Have just Ordered my Third Streaming Stick. I decided to de-Apple my Life and replaced my Apple TV with these Devices. Set up was Easy and was done in a few Minutes and i am now watching YouTube & Netflix with very good image Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful customer support
customer_reviews.text: My Roku Express failed to connect to the internet after six months, not an issue with my router/broadband. Roku have no agent support for these units, and neither do they provide details of where to return the unit to. Be warned, if it develops a fault, it's a throw-away. I will not go near anything with Roku on it in future.
customer_reviews.author: Rdbarlow

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I previously tried another older roku stick on a older tv with a early HDMI connection in the bedroom and it did not work. So I bought this roku with the expectation That this would not work either. Even bought a HMDI to scart lead convertor incase I had to convert it to another format to play. However it worked excellently. Well worth the cost. Now a old tv is up to date. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: kings lynn dave

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: First off was really surprised to get 2xAAA batteries included so thanks for that and was doubly surprised they were Duracell no some cheap never heard of brand so that was good too. The installation was easy and the wall plug for if the TV didn't have a USB port was a really nice touch too. I was a little disappointed that I had to add a payment method online and there was no option to just skip it for now. Price was good and the packaging was too so on the whole if you just want to add Netflix or some other streaming service to an older tv then this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that not all services are available in EU.
customer_reviews.text: For Romania: HBO GO, Spotify are not on the menu, even if the services are official present here (I have subcription native for Romania, no VPN). I have HBO GO on my PS4, iPad, Maca and even on the smart TV, as I have a contract with the cable company (and it is free as part of a package deal). NETFLIX works. So basically I got this as a "Netflix player" and nothing else since my smart tv (Sony) has Netflix but without the Romanian subtitles (It is SONY fault because they have to push an update for it). Would be nice to have HBO too, and Spotify.
customer_reviews.author: cristian

customer_reviews.title: Best £30 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 'dumb' TV and used this to make it a smart tv. I absolutely love it! It streams all my local catch-up channels. I was going to buy a smart tv but couldn't find one that would stream Netflix, Prime, YouTube, AND NowTv. This was the perfect solution. I was able to purchase a brand new big screen HDtv and this for £100 cheaper than a smaller smart tv. There are loads of free channels that I never use but all the big ones are there including 4, 5, Itv, and BBC channels. It is so easy to set up and link accounts to your pay for streaming services.
customer_reviews.author: Greta R.

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the UK channels that I wanted and that were advertised i.e. ITV hub, Now TV, Demand 5 & All4. Roku support were of no practical use and were unable to resolve the problem despite nearly a month of email correspondence. All their suggestions did not work. Returned to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mr P D Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Includes Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.text: Had a now TV box but was frustrated that it didn't have Amazon prime app, I had to use my console or cast from phone when I wanted to watch amazon. Changed to Roku box which is exactly the same interface but a far superior app store. I now have a single box with Now TV, Netflix, Amazon, Apple TV, Google Play Movies, and all UK on-demand channels. Only thing missing is Disney+ but other than that it's much better than the standard now tv box.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Device that does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to simplify the streaming process as I had been using Chromecast. This device is brilliant! You can download all the streaming channels you want to use and it works smoothly. It is easy to set up and easy to use. I would certainly recommend it. My only criticism would be minor in that the remote doesn't have a volume control or on/off button so the device sleeps in the background when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: KJWelsh

customer_reviews.title: Was great when it was working
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however after using it for 11 months it has suddenly stopped working and keeps telling us it’s due to a poor WiFi signal. Tested my parents Roku on our TV and that works fine so no idea why this has suddenly happened and it’s impossible to find out what the guarantee is on this item as can’t contact anyone about it. Shame as it has been a really great little tool up until now.
customer_reviews.author: CindyCB

customer_reviews.title: Great streaming performance once you load the apps you want
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up and has a good selection of apps (Netflix etc) pre-loaded but requires time and patience finding other streaming apps that you want. There is a huge selection and the descriptions of them can be vague. It's a case of trial and error but worth it if, like me, you are interested in very old films and TV shows. My only complaint is the lack of an off switch. I unplug every night as the power supply runs hot - probably not a problem if you can power via your TV's USB slot.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to turn a TV into a "smart" Tv
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 2 years ago from time of writing this review. I am generally happy with this product. I only have 2 issues. The WiFi can be tetchy, literally if the box is on the left of the TV I get 6Mbs and the right 24Mbs and the router is the other side of a brick wall (7feet). And the other issue is YouTube sometime drops it's signal (38Mbs currently) I think this is the app not the Roku hardware. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This device DOES NOT support NOW TV in Ireland
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item so that I could stream Prime Video and NOW TV on a single device. This device does not support NOW TV in Ireland even though you can buy Movie, Entertainment and Sport passes for same. Plenty of Apps to keep you entertained including the Big Guns; Netflix, YouTube, Spotify, Sky Store etc. but many of the Apps you won't have heard of and won't use. You are forced to register your Credit/Debit card details when signing up for a Roku Account online. After completing the registration process, I was presented with offers for those resident in the U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: ElvisP

customer_reviews.title: Way to go
customer_reviews.text: I cancelled cable service to only use Wi-Fi at a saving of about £30 per month. The Roku interface has provided a large number of APPS and services confirming that I had made the right choice. Having NOW-TV, NETFLIX and PRIME on one device is really good as well with many other options. A great shame that not all of the APPS are available in U.K. and hopefully this will change,
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: NOW even better
customer_reviews.text: I use the product to get iPlayer etc and Crunchyroll. I used to use a NOW! Box which at heart is a emasculated Roku that cant get Amazon or Netflix. I think the new NOW! sticks can get Netflix but still not Amazon. The NOW! box cost a tenner, this was two and a half times that but its newer and works absolutely fantastically - and in the same way, and with Amazon and Netflix. Easy to install both electrically and physically. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Caton

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money on a Smart TV.
customer_reviews.text: This little gem will save you a fortune if you have a T.V. that you love but you're secretly plotting to upgrade to a Smart TV. A big improvement on the Roku1 box, which I found very slow, with a perfect BluRay quality picture and a far easier set-up sequence. Not only all that, but it's portable too. You can take on holiday and watch it on your laptop or the T.V. in your hotel room. And as if that wasn't enough, it's only £25.00! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelk

customer_reviews.title: Great streaming device, although shame no hardwire
customer_reviews.text: Shame roku has stopped making its hardwired streaming devices which perform more stably than wifi driven ones. Use this for Nowtv, netflix and prime. Only gripe is when needing to enter passwords or searching - its like texting with an old nokia having to use the cursor to find each letter - the app or a mini keypad would be better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple way to make your TV smart
customer_reviews.text: I had an old LG TV and purchased this to 'upgrade' it whilst I saved for a smart TV with integrated apps. The Roku system is the best in my opinion as it provides all the apps you need (from Sky News to YouTube and Netflix). The interface is easy to navigate and you can personalise the home screen to the apps you use the most. The best function is that you can search across all the apps - so if you want to know what service a certain film is available on you can easily look it up without going into each app to check!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect viewing
customer_reviews.text: This is the answer to a TV addict's prayers. There are lots of streaming channels already installed but hundreds more can be added at any time. You can even watch your own photos and videos on your TV along with You Tube, Netflix etc. Great value and instant delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Tnorman

customer_reviews.title: Iplayer access.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for catchup on itv hub and bbc iplayer but despite already having an account for iplayer I can’t access it on Roku. It’s asking me to sign in again and giving me another code. It still doesn’t work. UPDATE. Is now working perfectly and doing exactly what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry  L

customer_reviews.title: Needs a SPARE (unused) HDMI port
customer_reviews.text: My TV has a HDMI port which is already used by my broadband service. It is not made clear that a spare (unused) HDMI port is required. I resent my time being wasted travelling to the post office to return it and having to order the more recent upgraded model. I am sure it works OK but very important information is omitted on the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Bobber

customer_reviews.title: Great for streaming and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in my car so I could screen mirror my phone but also have Prime and TV channels to watch when stationary. Cheaper than DVB TV module and not worrying having to install additional antenna. They only downside for me is that I can only use it in SD mode and not HD as I'm having to convert it from HDMI to CVBS as my headunit only had RCA input and not HDMI. But it still works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tezza Tucker Golding

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly sceptical with buying this for the kitchen tv but the shap sits perfectly on top and while the remote isnt point anywhere like my roku 3 box one tge remote only has to be pointing vaguely in the right direction to work. I got in the sale so was great value for money to be able to use for netflix now tv and amazon as not many devices can do that
customer_reviews.author: Hol1985

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up and performs well
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up and seems to maintain a stable connection. Apps load quickly with no buffering. No voice control on remote but I knew this before I bought it. Loads of channels to choose from but there is a lot of rubbish to wade through, some of which don’t work. Bought mainly for Netflix and Prime, which it does flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Best streaming stick out there
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Roku stick since the first model was available, I switched from a free nowTV box and would never go back. After doing research I decided on the Roku streaming stick because I could get every streaming app and was not limited like other brands are. Over time I found the original stick a bit slow and decided to upgrade to the express. I can safely say I am extremely happy with the upgrade. The express loads faster at boot up and app loading is much quicker. I use the express everyday and cannot fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a smart tv but then discovered this does the same job, so easy to set up and use, you do have to make accounts on a smart phone or table first to watch certain channels but only for the first time. I have since bought another for the bedroom TV as easier than unplugging and moving the original one around. It is possible to connect it as a wireless device but as the socket was close by I didn't bother
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Got for bedroom TV as it's a bit older and doesn't have Now TV or Prime video on its smart hub menu. Great little bit of kit. Only needed the HD version as TV isn't 4K. Works brilliantly. Does exactly what we wanted. No problem setting up and it's easy to access and operate. I've downloaded the app but have yet to try this. Good range of channels, better than fire stick.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for anyone out there who has a standard TV and wants to upgrade it to a Smart TV. You will need a HDMI port and a source of power (this could be a spare USB Port on the back of you TV). Once you get it up and running there is everything you could need IMO. All the major Channels i.e. BBC, ITV, All4, Channel 5, Netflix, Prime, Apple... the list goes on. Never had any issue when using this and does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Marc_Bucks

customer_reviews.title: It is legal
customer_reviews.text: It is very loud compared to normal tv. I very impressed with it. I am a Jehovah's witness and I can download the JW web sight on it. Which is great. You can download a lot of chanells on it. Very easy to use. You have to put your bank details in. They is in case you want to watch something which is not free, such as a movie. It is great. I would recommend to every one. It is better than using the device that dose exactly the same but, is legal.
customer_reviews.author: julie wootton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for such a powerful device
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a bit of a whim, after being disappointed with the choice of services on the Apple TV 2. Wow, I expected to be disappointed for £30 but to be honest, it's easily worth double this. It starts up quickly, is small, easy to install, the interface is easy to navigate, supports Netflix and Now TV and all the other main UK channels, and HD too. I even bought another one for downstairs. Highly recommended, and has been reliable for almost a year too. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: JON G

customer_reviews.title: Must have for non smart tvs
customer_reviews.text: The setup was simple, basically just create a roku account, link the device to the account with the code on screen and you're set. It seems nice and quick, I've used the YouTube, Netflix, and Prime Video apps, and each of them works flawlessly. The remote is nice to use and the buttons feel nice, although there are 2 very similar back buttons for some reason, and its unclear a lot of times which one is the one to use. Overall I'm very happy with this, well worth the (reduced) price.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be tricky to set up, but it was a breeze. I usually struggle getting devices on my network as individual mac numbers are needed...not with this machine, it displays it instantly. I also use it to miracast from my android phone seamlessly. Worked within a minute from set up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ZZman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know what all the bad reviews are, this little piece of kit has totally transformed my small TV. I don't have an aerial cable in my room so can't watch TV, only DVDs, I bought this in hope that I can atleast watch Netflix while cozy in bed. I can now do that and more! I've connected to Now TV, BBC iPlayer, ITV Hub, All4, My5 and best of all Netflix! The picture quality is top notch and it was super easy to set up. All you need is WiFi!
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without it 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my daughter who has left home now. We use ours with our 61" TV and it is brilliant. If you haven't got a roku yet, get one. You can use it to stream all your favourite channels such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, and YouTube. In fact I use it most for YouTube. It is so much easier to watch all this independent programming on a big screen from the comfort of a sofa. Highly, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON FIRESTICK REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: Had a firestick in my bedroom for a few years..it was ok but I wanted to watch Now tv as well as Netflix and Amazon so bought this fella. In my humble opinion it beats the Firestck in every department. Choice of channels, speed and reliability are great. Personally found the activation of my apps a bit unnecessarily complicated but maybe that's just me?
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend,My friend was well chuffed with her new Roku box, She now has everything in one place, Catch up tv, Netflix, Now Tv and Amazon Prime etc. I will be buying one for myself in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Genius little product
customer_reviews.text: Genius product. For years I have been connecting my ipad to the tv via a HDMI cable to watch Amazon Prime, Netflix, Now TV, BBC iplayer, spotify and Les Mills workouts but the wire did not extend far enough so I’d have to get up to change channels or move onto the next episode. The remote control works perfectly however I also like that I can control the TV from an app on my phone which is practically always closer to me. The product is small (which is a good thing) and easy to set up. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claire England

customer_reviews.title: Excellent media player
customer_reviews.text: I already have a firestick with Alexa but this Roku is much nicer. Its a touch longer to set up having to use a browser, I used my phone bit once your account is setup this streaming device is excellent. Massive bonus is you can use the USB port on the TV to power it so less cables. Also it has amazon prime onboard so you can login and watch your amazon shows and the iPlayer appa for BBC, ITV etc make it a complete package. Will purchase another for bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy peasy lemon squeezy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy peasy lemon squeezy to use.i have superfast broadband,so updates only took few seconds apps are excellent choose what you wont to add or delete great little box great value for money speedy delivery to
customer_reviews.author: shogun

customer_reviews.title: So much faster then the old streaming stick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for the old Roku streaming stick and its brilliant, It is so fast compared to the old one, all the apps load pretty much the instant you click on them, I wasn't sure that the range would be good on the remote as its now Infra Red but it works from a long way off without needing to be that accurate, Also the wireless range seems better, Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: No issues, simple to use, works well with ...
customer_reviews.text: No issues, simple to use, works well with Plex and Amazon prime. Had no issues with lip sync as others have mentioned. Remote is responsive and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was in two minds as to purchase this or a fire stick. I'm glad I chose this. Easy to connect and easy to set up. Would be better if you hadn't got to give your bank details to set up. I would have liked to be given an option. Remote is fast and responsive and on wifi works surprisingly fast. Main hub is in the living room and roku in bedroom no issues so far. Really good purchase for those TVs that don't have all the new apps. Really pleased with this and would definitely purchase another should the need arise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy streaming device for frequent travellers
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for frequent travellers, specifically because this form factor allows you use an HDMI Cable, essential in many hotel rooms where the back of the TV is fairly inaccessible (and you don't fancy destroying hotel property by unscrewing it from the walls). Roku software is slick, and agnostic, unlike some of the other devices you can buy from Apple / Amazon which limit you to certain providers, more so in future as they start to promote their own streaming services. 1080P is really all you need for travel - very rare to have a 4K TV in a hotel, and wifi speeds often too slow to support anyway.
customer_reviews.author: RLUK

customer_reviews.title: Splendid piece of kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I can watch Netflix in bed on the big TV or play music videos on YouTube. I only heard about Roku because my sister bought one for in the caravan and it’s like a godsend. I previously bought a chromecast from Amazon that did not work and turned out to be fake. After spending hours trying to get it to work and being very frustrated, this Roku is like a breath of fresh air. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: JF Liverpool

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gadget to use in Thailand. Now that I am stranded here due to the Corona Virus it has stopped working after just 3 months use. The power indicator light is blinking and I cannot re-set it. There is no useable advice on line about how to fix it. I am bitterly, bitterly disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should own one!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant having all streaming services in one place. Use it for NowTv, Netflix and Prime Video. The remote is a bit clunky but does the job, and the interface could be easier, but this could become better in future updates. You can also cast to it, so my Chromecast is in the drawer!
customer_reviews.author: M. Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Netflix and Prime
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Was a bit sceptical when buying, but works well for both Amazon Prime and Netflix, among other things. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I mainly got it for the Amazon Prime Video / TV watching, took about 10 minutes to set up which includes creating a Roku account and selecting what Apps you want on the box, you will get offered additional products here but is easy to say No Thanks too. Only thing that could be better is the length of the power cable, as the TV is wall mounted and I have the Roku attached to the base of the TV with the enclosed very sticky double sided mounting kit. I like the remote with it's fashionable cloth tag that pokes out from the base of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for catch-up TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for watching iPlayer and the rest of the catch-up channels. I really have nothing to complain about as that is really all I use with it. The Express is very small and unobtrusive and feels well made. The remote is small and feels well built and sturdy. All-in-all It was money well spent :)
customer_reviews.author: Spuddy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the fire stick and we love it and wanted one for ourselves. I ordered this as it was a little cheaper and the reviews were fantastic. I’m delighted we chose the Roku. It was so easy to set up with lots of apps to chose from. The remote is far more user friendly than the fire stick remote and I love that I can use my phone as a remote too. Great product, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: sarah mann

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my other Roku stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to replace an Amazon Fire stick as it would not allow me to get NOW TV which I needed to watch football. I ready own a Roku stick which is excellent. However, this new 'Express' version needs to be plugged into the mains (adapter and plug supplied) rather than just powered off a USB port. Works perfectly well but needs a spare socket close by
customer_reviews.author: tuftylfc

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: I do not like smart TV's but want to watch Netflix on a big screen. This fits the bill exactly, cheap to buy and unobtrusive on the TV works like a charm. I live half way up a mountain in France, and in winter it's lovely to settle down to a film or a series. Easy to install, easy to operate, full HD picture. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Great tech, but it won't last (until your warranty has run out course)
customer_reviews.text: This product HAD been fantastic, but like all of these gadgets - it only just lasted a year. In fact, we bought it in August 2019 and it died in September 2020 - so just out of warranty period. Isn't it amazing how these always just get past the 12 month mark. Same thing happened with Amazon Fire sticks too of which we've had 3. Sick of wasting money on these poorly made plastic pieces of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Good picture
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does prime and Netflix like I wanted. Don't like the fabric toggle on the remote but that could always be cut off. Menu is akin to the now TV box style. Easy to use, you can add apps to it. You have to set up an Roku account to use it and put in your card details. But it does not charge you unless you purchase something like an app or film etc. Love the little box/stick you can stick it to the side of your TV to keep it tidy (keeps it away from my toddlers reach which is brill)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple to setup, easy to use, small and subtle with swift loading times and interface (unlike a lot of SmartTVs). Also includes Netflix, Amazon Prime AND NowTV which neither Chromecast or the Firestick do, it's normally one or the other. Will most likely buy more for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: HayAlCoy

customer_reviews.title: plug n play
customer_reviews.text: The Roku does an excellent job of putting most streaming services right where you need them to be without a complicated set up. The problems arise where individual streaming services and their associated 'Help' pages (even www searches) fail to help sort out more complex issues of audio (5.1) issues. All my audio issues aside, the Roku is a solid bit of unobtrusive tech.
customer_reviews.author: RobMo

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and very simple interface. all the apps on there to do almost everything though of course main links were for Amazon. annoying that NOWTV app missing? unreasonably so? most other stuff gets all the main stuff (amazon Now Netflix) why not a standard Roku?????
customer_reviews.author: Jon and Julie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Unlike other devices like this it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Unlike other devices like this it doesn't lag. Enjoy the buttons to go straight to Netflix and others. The Spotify app has gone but hopefully it'll be back better than how it was.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Fast streaming stick
customer_reviews.text: The Roku stick seems to stream better than the amazon fire stick, it also has a nicer menu although the fire stick has excellent choice of programmes and videos if you are a prime member
customer_reviews.author: paul phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Initially it didnt work, think squeezing the USB power cable sorted that. Setup requires card details but looking on YouTube you can register without card details (it's free so why should I)and just add new devices that tell you a code to attatch to your account. I mainly use it for Netflix but it provides other channels too. In all really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Powell

customer_reviews.title: The best stick in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best bit for me is that you can watch amazon prime and google play all from the 1 stick. Both the firestick and chrome stop you from downloading each others app and in addition the search facility and Roku searches through all apps and tells you what app you can watch your chosen film etc on so you can see instantly if you can watch for free
customer_reviews.author: Julie_Hendry

customer_reviews.title: Great box, and under £30 is amazing value.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an upgrade over a black Sky NowTV box. Needed the Plex player and Netflix. It is so small, and comes with a sticky pad. I stuck this under the TV so there is no sign of it. It is really fast and we haven't had any issues. Really slick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Morsapelus

customer_reviews.title: Roku easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. I have roku account but for those that don't you will be told you need an account. It's not difficult. You will need to put in payment method in case you want movies you need to rent. Your card will not be used until that point. Safe as when you put it in Amazon for payment of goods. Roku is a good service.
customer_reviews.author: Maudex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent simple to use device
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent streaming device that is low power consumption and easy to use. The picture quality is great on my 1080p Panasonic TV. I had one initial problem with the device randomly freezing or rebooting. However this was caused by using the TV to power the device via USB. Once I plugged in the device to the mains, problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Faultless.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, easy to use and better than a now TV box. Also if you use showbox or similar apps on your phone you can cast to the Roku and watch full screen. I tried Android TV boxes but this thing is better. Doesn't crash all the time like the android box did. Also check out Google for hidden private apps. These are apps not on the Roku store but if you go to Roku website and put in the code you can add them to your box.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Not bad streaming player.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and does what the blurb says. But - and this is why i didn't give it 4 stars - there is a certain amount of interference on the programmes, with occasional loss of images and sound. Have tried everything to resolve this but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Luke Oswald

product_meta.title: Roku Express | HD Streaming Media Player
product_meta.description:
Want to start streaming? Then start here. Our best-priced player, Roku Express delivers a smooth HD streaming experience on your big-screen TV. Our next generation player is now 5X more powerful. It's easy to get started - just plug it into your TV with the included High Speed HDMI Cable, connect to the Internet, and start streaming. Use the remote to search for your favourite shows and discover channels. Enjoy 150,000+ movies and TV episodes, including blockbusters, award-winning original series, kids’ shows, live network TV, and more—across thousands of free or paid channels like Netflix, You Tube, Amazon Video, NOW TV, BBC iPlayer, and more. Get the free Roku mobile app for iOS and Android devices for a convenient way to search on your phone, enjoy private listening, share photos and more.

BOX CONTAINS
Roku Express Streaming Player
IR remote control
2 x AAA batteries
High Speed HDMI Cable
Power adapter
USB cable
Removable adhesive strip
Getting Started Guide
Important Product Information flyer
feature_bullets: Setup is easy with the included HDMI cable, simple remote and intuitive home screen
Enjoy live TV, news, sports, movies and TV episodes on thousands of free and paid channels like Netflix, BBC iPlayer, ITV Hub, All4, My5, Prime Video, NOW TV and many more
Easily search across top channels to see where you can stream shows for free or at the lowest cost
Use features like voice search, private listening, cast music & photos to your TV, and an extra remote with the free Roku mobile app (iOS & Android)
